history.proof: intros t a Hin. induction t. - destruct Hin. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: in_or_app. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: in_or_app. - simpl in Hin. apply in_app_or in Hin. destruct Hin. + apply IHt1 in H. apply all_leaves_in in H. auto. + apply IHt2 in H. apply all_leaves_in in H. auto.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A t1, t2 : btree a : A H : In a (all_leaves t1) IHt1 : In a (all_leaves t1) -> inb (leaf a) t1 IHt2 : In a (all_leaves t2) -> inb (leaf a) t2 Unable to unify "(fix In (a : ?M1529) (l : list ?M1529) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) ?M1532 (?M1530 ++ ?M1531)" with "inb (leaf a) (node t1 t2)".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A t1, t2 : btree a : A H : In a (all_leaves t2) IHt1 : In a (all_leaves t1) -> inb (leaf a) t1 IHt2 : In a (all_leaves t2) -> inb (leaf a) t2 Unable to unify "(fix In (a : ?M1541) (l : list ?M1541) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) ?M1544 (?M1542 ++ ?M1543)" with "inb (leaf a) (node t1 t2)".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

original: intros t a Hin. induction t. - destruct Hin. - simpl in Hin. apply in_app_or in Hin. destruct Hin. + apply IHt1 in H. apply all_leaves_in in H. apply in_or_app. left. auto. + apply IHt2 in H. apply all_leaves_in in H. apply in_or_app. right. auto.
